text: Climates were a British melodic hardcore band formed in 2011 in Lincoln, England, by Wesley Thompson, Sam Bowden, Fil Thorpe Evans, Harley Clifton and Henry Othen. However Evans departed in early 2013 to join Neck Deep full-time and Clifton and Othen both departed in 2012.
